label.name: POSITIVE
label.query: SELECT ca.mpcaComment FROM MpcaCommentAddition ca WHERE ca.mpcaAdditionType.addType = 'rank' AND ca.value = '5.0'

label.name: NEGATIVE
label.query: SELECT ca.mpcaComment FROM MpcaCommentAddition ca WHERE ca.mpcaAdditionType.addType = 'rank' AND (ca.value = '1.0' OR ca.value = '2.0')
